data.title: Bone Island Haunted Crawl
data.meta_description: Discover both kinds of spirits during our exploration of Bone Island on our adult only haunted pub crawl.
data.meta_site_name: Bone Island Haunted Pub Crawl & Ghost Tour
data.text:
Are you brave enough to delve into the darker side of Key West? Join us on the Bone Island Haunted Pub Crawl, a thrilling adventure that combines chilling ghost stories with lively pub hopping through the island's most haunted locations.

Prepare to be spooked and sip your way through history:

Uncover Key West's chilling past: Explore haunted mansions, former morgues, and infamous murder sites as your knowledgeable guide regales you with tales of restless spirits, paranormal activity, and local legends.

Raise a glass to the "spirits": Enjoy a drink of your choice (not included) at each of our carefully chosen pubs, adding a touch of liquid courage to your ghostly exploration.

Soak in the eerie atmosphere: As twilight descends, the cobblestone streets and historic buildings will take on a new, haunted charm, sending shivers down your spine.

Capture the memories: Take home a free souvenir T-shirt to commemorate your unique and unforgettable haunted pub crawl experience.

This tour is perfect for:

Thrill seekers and ghost enthusiasts: Unravel the mysteries of Key West's haunted past and encounter the city's spooky side.

History buffs: Gain fascinating insights into the island's darker chapters and the stories of its former residents.

Friends seeking a unique adventure: Bond over shared chills and laughter as you explore the haunted pubs and spooky streets.

Dare to join us on the Bone Island Haunted Pub Crawl? Prepare for a night of spine-tingling tales, chilling encounters, and lively pub hopping that will leave you with a newfound appreciation for Key West's rich and haunted history.

Space is limited so book soon.

Now every night at 8:30pm

Key West's Adult Only Ghost Tour. All guests must be 21+

$29.95 plus tax
